context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call for roadside assistance or a cab to quickly get him to the airport

call a taxi, Uber or any other car service available
contact a taxi or ride sharing service like Uber or Lyft to more quickly and reliably make it to the airport, in addition to arranging a tow service for his broken down vehicle
call for roadside assistance or a taxi service to help him reach the airport in time
call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride-sharing service to take him to the airport quickly

call a taxi or an Uber/Lyft to pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi or use a ride-hailing service like Uber or Lyft to get to the airport as quickly as possible

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: contact his supervisor to report the missing money
contact his supervisor or the store owner to report the missing money
immediately report the missing money to his supervisor or the owner of the bakery
check the security footage to see if the missing money can be accounted for or if there was any unauthorized access to the register
check the security camera footage if available to see if anything suspicious occurred
double check all the cash receipts and transactions made during his shift
immediately inform his superior or owner about the missing money, explaining the situation honestly and asking for assistance or guidance in rectifying the issue
check for any recording errors or miscalculations in the sales receipts or transaction records
immediately report the missing money to his superior, explaining the situation and offering to pay back the missing amount
immediately report the missing money to his supervisor or the owner of the bakery, explaining the situation honestly and offering to help figure out what happened

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay put
stay in one place
stay put
remain in one location, because it's easier for rescuers to find a stationary target than a moving one
stay put in one place or create a shelter, since moving around could make the rescue more difficult
start rationing out the remainder of their food and water supplies to ensure they last as long as possible, and seek out shelter to protect from the cold
stay put and not wander off
stay in one place, build a shelter and create a signal for rescuers
stay put and not wander further away
stay put at their current location or find an open, visible place and signal for help, such as using bright clothing or a fire to attract the attention of search parties
